name: TWOTCH: PrincessBeach68
description:
You won the lottery ! It's amaizing !

Now don't waste a minute, and go do something positive with all that money. Go give it to someone who needs it more than you, like your favorite streamer for exemple. You don't need all that money, you just want to see people happy and be loved.

DEFAULT CONTROLS (arrow keys and num pad recommended) :

A Tutorial can be found in-game.

F2: Toggle FPS
F4: Toggle Fullscreen
F5: Reset

Arrow keys: Move
Enter Key: Validate
ESC: Cancel
Page Down: Fast Dialog
Press X (Xbox) or Square (Playstation) to toggle your Controller
